taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Eragrostis ciliaris (L.) R. Br. var. ciliaris

bio:treatment.description: Panicles 0.2-1.5 cm wide, contracted; branches mostly appressed to the rachises, forming glomerate lobes. Spikelets densely packed.
bio:treatment.discussion: Eragrostis ciliaris var. ciliaris is more common than E. ciliaris var. laxa in the Flora region.
